column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This steakhouse was one of the best ones I've ever been to. My husband and I celebrated our 3rd wedding anniversary here so when I made the reservation
column2: it asked if we were celebrating anything. When I checked in
column3: the hostess wished us a happy anniversary. Then the waiter
column5: told us happy anniversary and said for any celebration they like to give guests champagne to toast. We ordered the bacon
column8: and the bone-in filet mignon. Every single item was unbelievably delicious. My husband got their old fashioned and he said it was one of the best ones he has ever had. Cannot day enough great things about this place. From the atmosphere to the service to the amazing food
column9: it's an absolute must dinner experience
